pages.text: $(br)Samples give you small bits of that resource.$(br2)They also spawn in the same chunk as their material, so you'll find veins easier.
$(br)Right click on a block to scan a 5x5 area.$(br2)It tells you which blocks are in this area.

pages.title: Veins
pages.text: $(br)Ores now generate in small or medium or big veins.
